productDescription: Meet the Coral Earpins, the little sisters of our Coral ring. These handmade 14K golden earpins have a small red/orange colored precious coral. Wear it individually or combine it with some other golden earrings for a more rebellious style. Handmade in our atelier of recycled gold.

optionalInfo.fit:
Size stone: diameter 3 mm
Sold per pair (2 pieces)
optionalInfo.production: Handmade in our Amsterdam based Atelier of recycled gold.
optionalInfo.additionalNotes: We pack your order in plastic-free package material. Free shipping on all NL orders.
